kactus2:function.name: mcapi_initialize
kactus2:function.description: Initializes the MCAPI implementation.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: node_id
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Unique node identifier.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mcapi_version
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The used MCAPI version.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mcapi_status
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to status variable for checking against errors.

kactus2:function.name: mcapi_finalize
kactus2:function.description: Finalizes the MCAPI implementation.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mcapi_status
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to status variable for checking against errors.

kactus2:function.name: mcapi_get_node_id
kactus2:function.description: Returns the node number associated with the local node.

kactus2:returnValue.description: The node id associated with the local node.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mcapi_status
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to status variable for checking against errors.

kactus2:function.name: mcapi_create_endpoint
kactus2:function.description: Creates an endpoint.

kactus2:returnValue.description: The created endpoint, if successfull. MCAPI_NULL if errors.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: port_id
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The port id for the endpoint.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mcapi_status
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to status variable for checking against errors.

kactus2:function.name: mcapi_get_endpoint_i
kactus2:function.description: Obtains the endpoint associated with the given tuple.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: node_id
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The node id of the node that owns the endpoint being obtained.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: port_id
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The port id of the endpoint to obtain.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: endpoint
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The retrieved endpoint.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: request
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to request status for asynchronous operation.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mcapi_status
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to status variable for checking against errors.

kactus2:function.name: mcapi_get_endpoint
kactus2:function.description: Obtains the endpoint associated with the given tuple.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: node_id
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The node id of the node that owns the endpoint being obtained.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: port_id
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The port id of the endpoint to obtain.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mcapi_status
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to status variable for checking against errors.

kactus2:function.name: mcapi_delete_endpoint
kactus2:function.description: Deletes an endpoint.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: endpoint
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The endpoint to delete.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mcapi_status
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to status variable for checking against errors.

kactus2:function.name: mcapi_get_endpoint_attribute
kactus2:function.description: Retrieves endpoint attributes.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: endpoint
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The endpoint whose attributes to retrieve.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: attribute_num
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The attribute number.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: attribute
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The retrieved attribute value.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: attribute_size
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The size of the retrieved attribute value.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mcapi_status
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to status variable for checking against errors.

kactus2:function.name: mcapi_set_endpoint_attribute
kactus2:function.description: Sets endpoint attributes.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: endpoint
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The endpoint whose attribute to set.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: attribute_num
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The attribute number.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: attribute
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The attribute value to set.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: attribute_size
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The size of the attribute value.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mcapi_status
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to status variable for checking against errors.

kactus2:function.name: mcapi_msg_send_i
kactus2:function.description: Sends a connectionless message from a send endpoint to a receive endpoint.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: send_endpoint
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The send endpoint (local).

kactus2:functionParameter.name: receive_endpoint
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The receive endpoint (remote).

kactus2:functionParameter.name: buffer
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The data to send.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: buffer_size
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The buffer size in bytes.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: priority
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The message priority.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: request
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to request status for asynchronous operation.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mcapi_status
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to status variable for checking against errors.

kactus2:function.name: mcapi_msg_send
kactus2:function.description: Sends a connectionless message from a send endpoint to a receive endpoint.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: send_endpoint
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The send endpoint (local).

kactus2:functionParameter.name: receive_endpoint
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The receive endpoint (remote).

kactus2:functionParameter.name: buffer
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The data to send.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: buffer_size
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The buffer size in bytes.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: priority
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The message priority.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mcapi_status
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to status variable for checking against errors.

kactus2:function.name: mcapi_msg_recv_i
kactus2:function.description: Receives a connectionless message from a receive endpoint.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: receive_endpoint
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The receive endpoint (local).

kactus2:functionParameter.name: buffer
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The buffer for incoming data.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: buffer_size
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The buffer size in bytes.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: request
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Used to determined if the receive operation has completed.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mcapi_status
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to status variable for checking against errors.

kactus2:function.name: mcapi_msg_recv
kactus2:function.description: Receives a connectionless message from a receive endpoint.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: receive_endpoint
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The receive endpoint (local).

kactus2:functionParameter.name: buffer
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The buffer for incoming data.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: buffer_size
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The buffer size in bytes.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: received_size
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The actual size of the received message.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mcapi_status
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to status variable for checking against errors.

kactus2:function.name: mcapi_msg_available
kactus2:function.description: Checks if messages are available on a receive endpoint.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: receive_endpoint
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The receive endpoint (local).

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mcapi_status
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to status variable for checking against errors.

kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to request status for asynchronous operation.

kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to status variable for checking against errors.

kactus2:function.name: mcapi_open_pktchan_recv_i
kactus2:function.description: Creates a typed, local representation of the channel.

kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to request status for asynchronous operation.

kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to request status for asynchronous operation.

kactus2:function.name: mcapi_test
kactus2:function.description: Tests if a non-blocking operation has completed.

kactus2:returnValue.description: MCAPI_TRUE on success. MCAPI_FALSE if errors or not complete.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: request
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to request status.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: size
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The number of bytes sent/received.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mcapi_status
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to status variable for checking against errors.

kactus2:function.name: mcapi_wait
kactus2:function.description: Waits for a non-blocking operation to complete.

kactus2:returnValue.description: MCAPI_TRUE on success. MCAPI_FALSE if errors.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: request
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to request status.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: size
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The number of bytes sent/received.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mcapi_status
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to status variable for checking against errors.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: timeout
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The delay for timeout.

kactus2:function.name: mcapi_wait_any
kactus2:function.description: Waits for any non-blocking operation in a list to complete.

kactus2:returnValue.description: The index into the request array of the mcapi_request_t identifier that has completed or has been canceled. On error, MCAPI_NULL is returned.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: number
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The number of requests in the array.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: requests
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The requests array.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: size
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The number of bytes sent/received.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mcapi_status
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to status variable for checking against errors.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: timeout
kactus2:functionParameter.description: The delay for timeout.

kactus2:function.name: mcapi_cancel
kactus2:function.description: Cancels an outstanding non-blocking operation.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: request
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to request status.

kactus2:functionParameter.name: mcapi_status
kactus2:functionParameter.description: Pointer to status variable for checking against errors.
